about_the_game:
[Game description]

This is a love avg game, similar to the usual galgame. Some scenes require you to click on simple options to interact.

In the game, you will play the male protagonist "Chun Ming",

Through his perspective, he composes a love story with every "her" in parallel time and space.

【game Features】

●Feast your eyes on many exquisite CG pictures.

●Professional cv full voice dubbing, making your ears happy together.

●Original background music, immersive game enjoyment.

●Diverse stories, the complete game consists of different types of stories to satisfy all tastes.

[story Introduction]

The game consists of multiple stories. We will continue to update the story in subsequent versions.

Although the male and female protagonists of each story have the same name, they are people living different lives and having different experiences in parallel time and space.

  • -------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------

Story 1: Semi-Amnesiac Girl

Chunming, a gamer who has been single for 25 years, kindly took in the amnesia girl "Qiye".

And in the process of getting along, feelings gradually developed.

But hidden behind the sweet happiness, what is her true identity?

    [/h2][/h2]
  • -------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------

Story 2: Restart! youth!

Chun Ming, a poor young man, accidentally traveled back to his high school days.

Facing my former first love girlfriend,

Can he seize the opportunity and regain what he has lost?


  • -------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------

(Other stories are under development, so stay tuned.)

Story 3: Development progress 80%


  • -------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------

Story 3: A long serialized story, the story of Chapter 1 has been completed and is under development...

content_descriptors.notes: Contains suggestive themes, brief depictions of threats and harassment, mild violence, crude humor and crass language, partial nudity.

name: Strange Parallel：Sele

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Multi-core 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790, 3.4 GHz | AMD Ryzen 5 1500X 3.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Nothing can stop those destined to meet.Cherish the opportunity given by God and fall in love with every "her" in parallel time and space.This candy contains love, keep it sweet~~~~~
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support
